1.name: Micheal Scott
quotes: I'm not superstitious, but I'm a little-stitious.
Sometimes I'll find a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way.
You don't know me. You've just see my penis

2.name: Dwight Schrute
quotes: It has to be official and it has to be urine.
I am fast. To give you a reference point I am somewhere between a snake and a mongoose… And a panther.
Reject a woman, and she will never let it go. One of the many defects of their kind. Also, weak arms.
There are a huge number of yeast infections in this county. Probably because we’re downriver from that old bread factory.
You couldn’t handle my undivided attention.
